titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of the right honourable William Lord Pagett, Baron of Beaudefert, &c. By John Heynes, A.M. and preacher of the New Church, Westminster
titleStmt.author: Heynes, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Fox, at the sign of the Angel in Westminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary imprimatur leaf, signed: Geo. Thorp, Reverendissimo in Christo Patri, Gulielmo Archiep. Cant. à sacris domesticis. Decemb. 13. 1678. Ex Ædibus Lambethanis.
Running title reads: A funeral sermon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
